# Request for Proposal for Audiovisual Equipment and Installation

## Solicitation Information

* Reference Number: WS3491363957-Doc3503025093
* Solicitation Number: WS3491363957
* Amendment Number: 5
* Publication Date: 2022-12-01
* Tender Closing Date and Time: 2023-02-28, 2:00 PM ET
* Amendment Date: 2023-02-28
* Solicitation Status: Cancelled

## Procurement Information

* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)

## Trade Agreements

* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

## Solicitation Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a contractor to supply, install, and integrate a fully functional audiovisual system and desktop workstation setup as part of the refit of Les Terrasses de la Chaudière, phase 1a in Gatineau, Quebec. The contract also includes an option for support and maintenance for up to three years, as outlined in Annex A - Scope of Work.

I also removed or rephrased certain sections that were not essential to the solicitation. Let me know if you'd like any further adjustments.
